meta-review.comment: Animal Crossing: New Horizons offers an immersive and enchanting gameplay experience, providing a natural and creative world that feels incredibly rewarding to explore. The real-time elements and diverse activities make each day in the game a joyous adventure, and the overall sense of joy and earnestness is truly rare in the gaming world. It's a perfect escapade, especially during difficult times, and it's a game that keeps players engaged and coming back for more.
